ygData.subject: Re: DoT/DD/Hymn equations
ygData.msgSnippet: I also would like the the dmg equation for CoD and DDD... As far as griffawns go I was Kiteing them at 17 useing CoD, Bellows, Selos.  But they are pretty slow
ygData.messageBody:
I also would like the the dmg equation for CoD and DDD... As far as
griffawns go I was Kiteing them at 17 useing CoD, Bellows, Selos. But they
are pretty slow so you should have no problem. thing about them tho..when i
kited kodiaks and such i would run around trees and such so it was harder
for them to get to me. Griffawns was diffrent since they fly. they didnt
seem impeaded with my attempt to get them to slow down by running them
through trees. Hope this information helps you.

Tearian Valmont of Povar

> Cool :)
> No one knows the dmg equation for CoD? Thats actually one of the more
> important ones =) I've been kiting yellow gorge hounds at level 15 (just
> got 16) and wasn't able to tell if weaving selos/bellow/cod was better
than
> selos/bellow/bellow (using strings). Any help is appreciated...oh, anyone
> know if I would be able to kite griffawns like this? I hear they run the
> same speed as hounds, and I never actually get hit while kiting...I just
> sorta run around in a circle to the beat of my own footsteps =)
>
> Thanks again,
> Taluvil
